extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void autoPopulate(ModelArmy army)
      Performs ModelSquad.autoPopulate(ModelArmy, int) distinguishing between the minimum army size based on whether this WarMenu.SlickSquad is the user's or not.

      Draws this WarMenu.SlickSquad on the specified Frame.

      Updates this WarMenu.SlickSquad.
